8397.quoteDoc: Privacy Policy: Software and Technology Projects
8397.quoteText: You may choose to correct, update, access or delete the personal information you have submitted to us by sending an email to privacypolicy@eff.org.

8398.quoteText:
Updated on June 2, 2014 to reflect the possible collection of information for research datasets.

Updated on February 4, 2015 to correct typographical errors.

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms

8399.quoteDoc: Privacy Policy: Software and Technology Projects
8399.quoteText:
Contacting EFF

If you have any questions about our privacy and data protection practices, you can reach EFF at:

Electronic Frontier Foundation
815 Eddy Street
San Francisco, CA 94109 USA
Phone: +1-415-436-9333
Fax: +1-415-436-9993
Email: privacypolicy@eff.org.
8399.title: The service provides a free help desk

tosdr.case: The service provides a free help desk

8400.quoteDoc: Privacy Policy: Software and Technology Projects
8400.quoteText: Security: EFF employs industry standard security measures to protect the loss, misuse, and alteration of the information under our control, including appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure a level of security appropriate to the risk, such as the pseudonymization and encryption of personal data, data backup systems, and engaging security professionals to evaluate our systems effectiveness. Although we make good faith efforts to store information collected by EFF in a secure operating environment, we cannot guarantee complete security.
8400.title: The service provides a complaint mechanism for the handling of personal data

tosdr.case: The service provides a complaint mechanism for the handling of personal data

8401.quoteDoc: Privacy Policy: Software and Technology Projects
8401.quoteText: Generally, we do not store personally identifiable information (PII), including the IP addresses of users, when collecting bug reports or research data. However, on occasion, we may store IP addresses for limited debugging purposes. (You may also choose to submit these reports and data via Tor in order to prevent us from being able to observe your IP address.)
8401.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

tosdr.case: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

8403.quoteDoc: Privacy Policy: Software and Technology Projects
8403.quoteText: We may occasionally update this document or the relevant user interfaces to reflect changes in the information that we collect or new products or technologies we release. However, any revised privacy policy will be consistent with EFF's mission and will be available at https://www.eff.org/code/privacy-policy.
8403.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.case: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

8404.quoteDoc: Privacy Policy: Software and Technology Projects
8404.quoteText:
Your Information: While EFF endeavors to provide the highest level of protection for your information, we may disclose personally identifiable information about you to third parties in limited circumstances, including: (1) with your consent. or (2) when we have a good faith belief it is required by law, such as pursuant to a subpoena or other judicial or administrative order.

If we are required by law to disclose the information that you have submitted, we will attempt to provide you with prior notice (unless we are prohibited or it would be futile) that a request for your information has been made in order to give you an opportunity to object to the disclosure. We will attempt to provide this notice by whatever means is reasonably practical.
8404.title: This service only shares user information with third parties when given specific consent

tosdr.case: This service only shares user information with third parties when given specific consent
